titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3150) to improve aviation security, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-264, by Mr. Reynolds.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3150 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 90.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 274.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/1/2001--Passed House amended. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3150 (aviation security).
